Select T1.idx ,concat('****-',right(trim(T1.customerKey),4)) as customerKey ,replace(T1.counsel,replace('\n',' ',''), replace('
',' ','')) as counsel ,T1.counselImage ,T1.counselState ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.counselDateTime, '%Y.%m.%d') as counselDateTime ,ifnull(T3.userId,'') as userId ,ifnull(T4.userName,'') as userName ,ifnull(T3.counselResult,'') as counselResult ,T3.counselResultImage ,Case When ifnull(T3.counselResultDateTime,'') = '' Then '' Else DATE_FORMAT(T3.counselResultDateTime, '%Y.%m.%d') End counselResultDateTime From smCounsel T1 Left Join smCustomer T2 On T1.customerKey = T2.customerKey Left Join smCounselResult T3 On T1.idx = T3.idx Left Join ofUser T4 On T3.userId = T4.userId WHERE T1.groupId= #{groupId} And T1.customerKey = #{customerKey} Order by counselDateTime desc ,idx desc LIMIT ${page_limit_val1} , ${page_limit_val2}
